item.title: New eror plss help me plss
item.dc:creator: @powerscape powerscape
item.description:
@powerscape wrote:

i ad this code

[code]if(command.startsWith(“openevent”) && playerRights > 1)
{
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1592, 2599, 4774, 0);
yell("[EVENT] THE EVENT HAS BEEN OPENED!");
server.event = true;

}
if(command.startsWith(“closeevent”) && playerRights > 1)
{
yell("[EVENT] THE EVENT HAS BEEN CLOSED!");
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null){
client eventer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i];
if(eventer.isInEvent()){
eventer.toX = 3088;
eventer.toY = 3500;
}
}
}
server.event = false;
}
if(command.startsWith(“event”))
{
if(server.event || playerRights > 0){
toX = 2598;
toY = 4769;
resetfollowers();
}else
sM(“The event is closed!”);
}
[/code]
this is de eror

Read full topic
